alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Iowa; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 1:31AM CDT until July 24 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Western Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 130 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Prairie Du Sac to 7 miles south of Mount Horeb, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Middleton, Stoughton, Waunakee, Baraboo, Verona, Portage, Oregon, McFarland, Monona, Mount Horeb, Windsor, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Lake Wisconsin, Deforest, Cross Plains and Lodi. People attending The Dane County Fair in Madison should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes the following Locations Wisconsin State Capitol, Gibraltar Rock Natural Area County Park, Pine Island State Wildlife Area, and Alliant Energy Portage Power Plant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
